#labels Featured
 = Introduction =
Publish the data of temperature and humidity of the house to pachube server.

 = Hardwares =
 * [http://www.dfrobot.com/index.php?route=product/product&filter_name=mega%201280&filter_category_id=38&product_id=358 Arduino Mega board]
[http://www.dfrobot.com/image/cache/data/DFR0108/01-500x500.jpg]
 * [http://www.dfrobot.com/index.php?route=product/product&filter_name=Ethernet%205100&filter_category_id=39&product_id=455 Ethernet Shield]
[http://www.dfrobot.com/image/cache/data/DFR0125/DFR0125-500x500.jpg]
 * [http://www.dfrobot.com/index.php?route=product/product&keyword=dfr0067&category_id=0&description=1&model=1&product_id=174 Sensor DHT11]
[http://www.dfrobot.com/image/cache/data/DFR0067/DFR0067-500x500.jpg]
 * [http://item.taobao.com/item.htm?id=14616712897 Sensor AM2311]
[http://www.aosong.com/asp_bin/Products/AM2311.jpg]
 * Network cable to connect the sheild and router
 * USB cable to connect Arduino and PC (optional, just for debug)
